questions.answer_text: A linked list is a linear data structure where each element is a separate object.

questions.question_text: Explain the difference between stack and queue.
questions.answer_text: Stack follows LIFO (Last In, First Out) principle, while queue follows FIFO (First In, First Out) principle.

questions.question_text: What is a binary search algorithm?
questions.answer_text: Binary search is a search algorithm that finds the position of a target value within a sorted array.

questions.question_text: Explain the time complexity of quicksort.
questions.answer_text: The average time complexity of quicksort is O(n log n), but the worst-case complexity is O(n^2).
